title: WTF IS THIS BULLSHIT CREEPBLOCK
body:
stop fking the game over riot. last hitting is impossible with this new creep block system which nobody likes. Any melee champ that is big cant last hit. my cs went from 200 at 25 to like 100 at 25 on my main champs because i cant move through the fucking wave.

FFS

replies.body:
Hey man, just a heads up they are reverting the changes.

you can see here from the dev blog

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/EWLnAleN-follow-up-pathing-aka-minion-blocking-update

Expect it in next patch i believe


All the best mate

I was really pissed but the tone from this post makes me less pissed. thanks :)

Editkappa: just read the post, and they're going to have to TEST the OLD version to see if people are happy with it....

They haven't changed it in "5 years" before this, so why would people not be happy with it ...

fkn EA at it again.

Oh, i meant Riot.

> [{quoted}](name=Exhausted,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=XE6G6LBW,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-12-02T07:07:18.038+0000)

> Expect it in next patch i believe


I hope you're right.

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=XE6G6LBW,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2015-12-02T20:25:20.333+0000)
>
> I hope you're right.

Me to...
the worst thing is wen you vs a mundo like champ and you need to go in front of your minions to get cs because you cant hit it from behind them
It seems like it's gotten worse
lol im glad to be a jungle main :D{{champion:154}}
For a second I thought you said it went from 200 to 25...
I think its funny how EVERYONE says this, its not just one or two people, everyone agrees its awful. fix it!
no fix jax first do it riot
I agree, trying to farm as a melee champ is a bit of a pain
Yeah it is a noticeable change and a massive pain in the arse.
It's funny how even lane minions sometimes get creepblock and get stuck at an awkward position and stays there for the whole game until it gets killed.
